text.name: longdescription
text.text: Built by Acorn Computers in the 1980s for the BBC Computer Literacy Project. CPU MOS Technology 6502A @ 2MHz, 32KB RAM + 16KB OS ROM + 16KB BASIC ROM, Graphics Motorola 6845 and Mullard SAA5050 (up to 640×256 (PAL) or 640×200 (NTSC)), Sound Texas Instruments SN76489. Released Dec ’81.
